short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Squirrel Wallpaper turn new tab to custom Squirrel background. Cute Squirrel wallpaper background theme for animal fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Squirrel wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize your Squirrel background or set favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.
4. Quick links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Convenient access to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Instant access to download wallpapers.
14. One-click access to gaming.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Squirrel new tab.
